name: backend_notifications
title: Backend and E-mail Notifications
description: Set up e-mail alerts and HTTP callbacks that get triggered when your videos become available.
notes: Can't add templates? Getting "The access to service [eventnotification_eventnotificationtemplate->add] is forbidden"

control_sets.title: Starting a KalturaSession
control_sets.tip:
Start a KalturaSession (ks) by supplying your Partner ID and Admin Secret.

You can find your info in the [Kaltura Management Console](http://kmc.kaltura.com/index.php/kmc/kmc4#account|integration)

control_sets.title: Choosing a Template
control_sets.tip:
Notification Templates can be used to send you an e-mail or call a particular URL under certain conditions, e.g. when a new video is uploaded.

In order to create a new notification, you must clone one of the pre-made templates below. You can see the available templates using ```eventNotificationTemplate.listTemplates```

Choose a template to clone.

control_sets.title: Cloning the Template
control_sets.tip: Fill in some additional details for your template and use the form below to create it

control_sets.title: Viewing your Notification Templates
control_sets.tip: Use ```eventNotificationTemplate.list``` to get a list of your templates.
